meanings.definition: A person who offers something for acceptance.
meanings.sent1: The profferers handed out flyers for the event.
meanings.sent2: The profferers brought samples of their new product to the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The profferers tried to give away free hugs on the street.
meanings.sent4: The profferers were like friendly ambassadors of goodwill.
meanings.sent5: The profferers eagerly shared their homemade cookies with everyone.

meanings.definition: Those who present something for consideration.
meanings.sent1: The profferers submitted their proposal to the committee.
meanings.sent2: The profferers displayed their artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The profferers offered a unique solution to the problem.
meanings.sent4: The profferers were like messengers of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The profferers carefully explained their plan for the project.
